title: Locked Locked Locked -update- For a Good Reason
text:
I‚Äôve been locked out of my account from LinkedIn twice already verified my government ID. No way to contact support. Government ID verification won‚Äôt work anymore. I got a bad taste in my mouth.

-Update- The bad tasted is gone! LinkedIn you do a wonderful job protecting privacy. Highly Respectable and Appreciated and the support was fast! Lesson learned if you use a VNP set-up a Authenticator App! 1 star to 5!

title: Broken app
text:
This app is useless because it won‚Äôt let me sign in. It tries to verify me with a CAPTCHA, tells me I was successful, and then responds with ‚Äúmissing or invalid‚Äù CAPTCHA response code error message.

UPDATE: Uninstalling and reinstalling the app fixed my issue. I added some stars back to my rating, but be aware this is a buggy app.

title: Subscription Value Isn‚Äôt There
text: LinkedIn now is basically a professional Facebook. But $35 a month for premium just to search for jobs? The value isn‚Äôt there. Even the integrated AI isn‚Äôt worth it. Just use ChatGPT to write your summary and save yourself the $30. It seems like entire industries are moving away from posting jobs on LinkedIn as well.

title: Consumer usage
text:
LinkedIn is a great employment focused social media platform which has enhanced the professional world we live in. 

It has many features, outlets, and approaches for individuals and groups to connect along with to find opportunities and news for their needs. But within the like tab, there should be an ‚Äúemphasis‚Äù (possibly an exclamation) tab for posts to show alertness/awareness for people‚Äôs expression.

title: 4 months with nothing
text: I subscribed in November and cancelled it in March. At $70/month I would have assumed I would have at least gotten an interview with it, but didn‚Äôt get a single one using LinkedIn. I‚Äôm honestly not even sure how the features really help. Maybe in other industries it works better (I‚Äôm in UX writing/content design/copywriting) but I have had much more success with tools like Dice or Teal or even just on my own.

title: Helped provide an opportunity
text: Gave me the tools to connect with the best all around people  and learn at the same time
